segments.text: Come on , you are left behind !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , I can't catch my breath . You are running too fast , honey .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but you need to slow down . This is jogging , not racing !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't care . I want to burn up my fat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But running so fast is not good for people over forties .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are not as athletic as we were when young . Mild exercise is more suitable for us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I want to burn up more calories !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In fact , in order to burn up your fat , you must take it slowly for a longer time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I will slow down then .
segments.speaker: S1
